description: Add or delete Regions from your replication set.

parameters.name: actions
parameters.description: An action to add or delete a Region. (dict) --- Details used when updating the replication set. addRegionAction (dict) --- Details about the Amazon Web Services Region that you're adding to the replication set. The Amazon Web Services Region name to add to the replication set. sseKmsKeyId (string) --- The KMS key ID to use to encrypt your replication set. deleteRegionAction (dict) --- Details about the Amazon Web Services Region that you're deleting to the replication set. The name of the Amazon Web Services Region you're deleting from the replication set.

nested_params.name: addRegionAction
nested_params.description: Details about the Amazon Web Services Region that you're adding to the replication set.

nested_params.name: regionName
nested_params.description: The Amazon Web Services Region name to add to the replication set.

nested_params.name: sseKmsKeyId
nested_params.description: The KMS key ID to use to encrypt your replication set.

nested_params.name: deleteRegionAction
nested_params.description: Details about the Amazon Web Services Region that you're deleting to the replication set.

nested_params.name: regionName
nested_params.description: The name of the Amazon Web Services Region you're deleting from the replication set.

parameters.name: arn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the replication set you're updating.

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: A token that ensures that the operation is called only once with the specified details. This field is autopopulated if not provided.
